answerText: phase diagram [or phase chart] [10] A phase diagram can also show this point, which is the pressure and temperature at which all three phases exist together in equilibrium.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 9 | 19 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name the following about the chemistry of solids, liquids, and gases,  [10]  This chart used in various chemistry courses shows which conditions are conducive to a substance being a solid, liquid, or gas. It has axes for pressure and temperature and includes the critical point.
